Author: ijustneededaname
Text: Jeez, I'm sorry you're going through this. Hopefully your mom isn't always like this, because to me it sounds kinda toxic. Guilt tripping isn't the answer, like damn, lady. I don't know what the best thing to say to her is, but I hope you can stay sane there for the time being. Please take care of yourself and try not to let her get to you <3
